title: The New Beginning
description: Edward looks out over the city, seeing a new dawn breaking for humanity. He knows that there is still much work to be done, but he is ready to face whatever challenges come next, armed with his scissorhands and a newfound sense of purpose.

sections.name: A New Dawn
sections.description: Edward stands on the rooftop, gazing out at the city below. The sky is painted with hues of pink and orange as the sun rises, casting a warm glow over the dark buildings. He feels a sense of hope and determination wash over him as he thinks about the future.

sections.name: The Road Ahead
sections.setting: A quiet alleyway in the city
sections.description: Edward walks through the city streets, his scissorhands at his side. He is met with nods of respect and whispers of encouragement from the humans who live in secret. He knows that there will be many challenges ahead, but he is ready to face them head-on.

sections.name: A Sense of Purpose
sections.description: Edward sits among the ancient tomes and scrolls, feeling a sense of wonder and awe at the knowledge that surrounds him. He begins to realize that his scissorhands are not just a tool for fighting, but also a key to unlocking the secrets of the past.
